channel.title: Adding ::commands
channel.description:
How do you add a ::commands command with a list of usable commands? also; how do you change the welcome message? and while im here is there a way to add something at the very start witch tells you if you have a pin and all that?
thanks, Felixrad

item.title: Adding ::commands
item.description:
@127.0.0.1 wrote:

//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 0 Hans 0 0 npc = 1 Man 2 0 npc = 2 Man 2 0 npc = 3 Man 2 0 npc = 4 Woman 2 0 npc = 5 Woman 2 0 npc = 6 Woman 2 0 npc = 7 Farmer 7 0 npc = 8 Thief 16 0 npc = 9 Guard 21 0

change the 0’s on the right to the hp u want it to be

Read full topic
